title: LineageOS 19 based on Android 12 goes official w/ builds for selected Pixel phones
content:
Over the past few months, we’ve seen a number of unofficial builds of LineageOS 19 based upon Android 12, but now this third-party ROM is officially available.

more…

The post LineageOS 19 based on Android 12 goes official w/ builds for selected Pixel phones appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Popular third-party ROM LineageOS 19 based upon Android 12 is now officially available for supported devices after being announced.
